description.p: GUsb is a GObject wrapper for libusb1 that makes it easy to do asynchronous control, bulk and interrupt transfers with proper cancellation and integration into a mainloop. This makes it easy to integrate low level USB transfers with your high-level application or system daemon.
This release adds the following feature:

ul.li: Add an device error code for 'busy'
